trans-unit.source: Represents any <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> content intended to be displayed to an end user.
Text content is HTML (with escaped markup), XHTML (valid XML, and is not escaped), or plain text.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent"></xref> instance.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent"></xref> instance.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent"></xref> with the specified text.
The text of the content.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent"></xref> with the specified text and <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContentKind"></xref>.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContentKind> parameter may be set to one of the following values:
The text of the content.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContentKind"></xref> that describes the content.
Creates a copy of the existing <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent"></xref> instance.
A new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent"></xref> instance.
Gets the text of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent"></xref>.
The text of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent"></xref>.
Gets the content type of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent"></xref>.
This property may have the following values:
"text" for plain text content.
"html" for HTML content.
"xhtml" for XHTML content.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the kind of Text Syndication Content.
Writes the contents of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> to write to.
